original_text: Pharaoh quickly summoned Moses and Aaron and said, “I have sinned against the Lord your God and against you.
korean_text: 바로가 모세와 아론을 급히 불러 이르되 내가 너희의 하나님 여호와와 너희에게 죄를 지었으니

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh quickly summoned Moses and Aaron
I have sinned against the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신의 하나님 여호와께 죄를 지었습니다
